title: Are the mystery gift/chest things out yet?
body: The "Worlds Hits the Rift" article said the mystery gift things for "self gifting" would be out today, I was also under the impression you get tickets for chest purchases but i can't remember where i heard this. Where they at?

replies.body: Question if  i buy the 790 Box what is the AVG cost of the skin i will be rewarded???

Those mystery gifts guarantee a skin of at least 975 RP. Be sure to check the [**Worlds Mystery Item FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012060367-Worlds-Mystery-Items) for details.
